tagline: Production vision systems — object detection, segmentation, OCR, and edge deployment that works in the real world
pros: Full vision stack: detection, segmentation, OCR, tracking, generation, multimodal
Data-first approach — invests in label quality and augmentation before model complexity
Edge deployment expertise: CoreML, TFLite, TensorRT, OpenVINO
Failure case analysis with visual evidence — you see what the model gets wrong and why
cons: Needs labeled visual data — effectiveness scales with dataset quality
Vision models have higher compute requirements than text-based ML
Doesn't build application UIs or manage camera/sensor infrastructure
